p_production_rate.description: Rp: production rate for the product (P)

rp: biomass-specific production rate, in g/(g biomass*h)

s_production_rate.description: Rs: production rate for the substrate (S)

x_production_rate.description: Rx: production rate for the biomass (X)

mu: mu(μ): growth rate. (1/h). Rx is substituted by μ.

biomass_yield.description: Ysx, in g biomass produced / g substrate consumed

product_yield.description: Ysp, in g product produced / g substrate consumed

product_titer.description: Product titer (Cp), in gproduct/L: the concentration of the product in the culture.

P: the product of the Rp and time (t, in h)

μ: growth rate(μ or mu): the rate of biomass(X) formation with CO2 as a byproduct.
Ysx: biomass yield: grams of biomass produced divided per grams of substrate consumed
ms: maintenance rate: rate at which substrate is converted into CO2 to gain energy
